item.description: Code from operator import itemgetter def solution(N, stages): answer = [] stages.sort() l = len(stages) stages.append(501) now_stage = stages[0] not_clear_user = 0 failure_rate = {} check = [False] * N i = 0 while True: if stages[i] == now_stage: not_clear_user += 1 else: reched_user = l - i + not_clear_user if now_stage != N+1: failure_rate[now_stage] = float(not_clear_user) / float(reched_user) check[now_stage-1] = True now_stage = stages[i] if now_stage == N+1: break not_clear_user = 1 if stages[i] == 501: break i += 1 temp = sorted(failure_rate.
